mapper.sql: a.MOMaterialsID as "momaterialsID", a.MoDetailsID as "moDetailsID", a.cWhCode as "cWhCode", a.cWhName as "cWhName", a.cInvCode as "cInvCode", a.cInvName as "cInvName", a.cInvStd as "cInvStd", a.cComUnitCode as "cComUnitCode", a.cComUnitName as "cComUnitName", a.iQuantity as "iQuantity", a.cBatch as "cBatch", a.dRequiredDate as "dRequiredDate"
